condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, local governments, especially in convergence counties and other vulnerable areas have strengthened capacity to assess WASH needs, plan, implement, manage and monitor WASH services

description.narrative: Construction works of 11 water supply systems which were carried over from 2019 are in progress. Preparation of designs and bill of quantities of 15 water supply systems have been completed. Procurement of off-shore WASH supplies for nine counties and Ri water supply systems is in progress. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:27/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of people accessing a sustainable drinking water service in the reporting year only
